mechanics.condition: Caster casts Fog Cloud targeting a point within range
mechanics.outcome: A 20-foot-radius sphere of fog is created, centered on the chosen point

mechanics.condition: The Fog Cloud area encounters corners
mechanics.outcome: The sphere's area of effect spreads around corners, not being blocked by them

mechanics.trigger: Any creature or object within or viewing the area
mechanics.condition: Creature or object is located within the Fog Cloud's area, or viewing into/out of it
The spell has been cast and no dispersal condition is met
mechanics.outcome: The Fog Cloud persists for its specified duration

mechanics.condition: A wind of moderate speed (at least 10 miles per hour) or greater is present in the Fog Cloud's area
mechanics.outcome: The Fog Cloud is immediately dispersed and ends

description_text: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.
